item.title: Jonathan Bennion - SemiUpdated Current Projects
item.description:
Hi there âœŒ

Overall I’m anti-AI hype, pro-machine-learning development.

My projects needed a centralized place to live, so here they are:

List of current areas of focus:

  • Bias Correction in LM-Generated Content
  • Agentic Counterfactual Correction in LM-Generated Content
  • Logical Fallacy Correction for News and LM-Generated Content

Ping me to discuss anything further, and pay attention to this Flog (a fragmented thought log) for updates.
